en.title: Other legal proceedings outside of England and Wales

cya.question: Have you ever been involved in any court cases relating to your marriage, property or children?

en.summary: The court needs to know if there are currently any legal proceedings in a court, tribunal or other authority which are either:

options.affectsValidity: may affect its validity (how legally binding the marriage is)

en.question: Are there any other legal proceedings the court needs to know about?

includes.courtDetails: name of the court, the tribunal, and/or the authority
includes.dates: date that the proceedings began and of any future hearings
includes.others: anything else that might affect the application for divorce

errors.required: Select ‘No’ if you do not have any legal proceedings
errors.requireCaseDetails: Enter details of the court cases
